text.title: Palestinian prisoner Khader Adnan stops hunger strike, due to be released
text.head: Palestinian prisoner Khader Adnan stops hunger strike, due to be released
Sources

list.item: "Israel to free Palestinian hunger-striker Khader Adnan" — Deutsche Welle , June 29, 2015
"Palestinian detainee ends hunger strike: Lawyer" — Press TV , June 29, 2015
Xinhua News Agency. "Israeli physicians urges release of Palestinian prisoner on hunger strike" — Global Times , June 24, 2015
"Hunger-striking prisoner Khader Adnan’s life in danger, says ICRC" — Al-Hourria , June 24, 2015
Mahmoud al-Saadi. "Islamic Jihad threatens to end truce if Adnan dies" — al-Araby al-Jadeed , June 22, 2015
